titleStmt.title: A a [sic] letter to a friend, concerning a French invasion, to restore the late King James to his throne And what may be expected from him, should he be successful in it. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh, by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to Their most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
